about_the_game:
Buried deep within the Orion Laboratory, an isolated sector remains untouched... Until now.

Your first day was never supposed to be like this. The sector you were assigned to has been abandoned for years, its walls rusted, its air thick with decay. Something happened here—something no one talks about. Before you can make sense of it, the power fails, and you’re left alone in the dark.

This self-contained chapter of FESTERED takes you through an unexplored section of the laboratory, offering a unique layout, objectives, and storyline. Experience the oppressive atmosphere, PSX-style visuals, and survival mechanics of the full game, condensed into a tense 15-minute experience.

  • 40-Minute Horror Experience – A short but intense descent into the horrors of Orion Laboratory.

  • Retro Survival Horror: Experience the tension of PSX/PS1-style graphics and a haunting retro soundtrack.

  • Standalone Experience: Experience a unique map, objectives, and storyline separate from the main game.

  • Tense Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in an oppressive, fear-filled environment where every shadow hides a new threat.

  • Permadeath Mechanics: With only three lives, one mistake could cost everything.


    Detailed Description

    Awakened as a new recruit in the Orion Laboratory, you quickly realize that things are not as they should be. What begins as a mundane first day on the job spirals into a desperate fight for survival as the facility descends into chaos.

    Explore an entirely new area of the decaying laboratory, overrun by fungal growths and dark secrets. Scavenge for supplies, complete critical objectives, and uncover clues about what led to the facility’s downfall. But beware—the threats lurking in the shadows are unforgiving, and with only one chance to survive, every choice could be your last.

    The demo is your chance to experience FESTERED on a smaller scale, with all the fear, tension, and challenges that await in the full game. Can you survive your first day, or will you join the countless others lost to the infestation?

    Welcome to the demo. Welcome to FESTERED.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains non-realistic depictions of violence, and frequent scary imagery.
